CustomField.description: Filter type identifies if the icon condition records will inclusive (AND) conditions, or exclusive (OR) conditions. For a single condition, the default is AND. Note, currently, a combination of inclusive AND exclusive conditions is not supported.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Filter type identifies if the icon condition records will inclusive (AND) conditions, or exclusive (OR) conditions. For a single condition, the default is AND. Note, currently, a combination of inclusive AND exclusive conditions is not supported.
CustomField.label: Filter Type
